text: George Boyd Kernek (January 12, 1940 â€“ August 14, 2022) was an American professional baseball player. He was in 30 games in Major League Baseball as a first baseman and pinch hitter for the St. Louis Cardinals from 1965 to 1966."George Kernek Statistics and History". baseball-reference.com. Retrieved February 10, 2011. He was born in Holdenville, Oklahoma. Kernek died on August 14, 2022 in Purcell, Oklahoma at the age of 82.George Boyd Kernek, purcellregister.com ==References== Category:1940 births Category:2022 deaths Category:St. Louis Cardinals players Category:Sportspeople from Oklahoma
title: George Kernek
